skills.name: Slash Rocks
skills.description: Swings a giant sword to deal damage and decrease the target's Defense for 2 turns with a 40% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +20%
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Slash Waves
skills.description: Attacks an enemy with a sword 2 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the target's Attack Power for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Slash Wind
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a lightning fast slash, making the target's Attack Bar drop to 0, and inflicts an irresistible taunt for 1 turn. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.0*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.3*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
